Input format: Template order and text data.Output format: A text containing template order and consideration process. If there are more than one result, the consideration process of each are split by [sep]. input: [Template_1] I am using the external speaker -- sound is good .
output: [Template_1]  [sep] Noted for its good, the external speaker of the text indicates a positive perspective. [sep] Noted for its good, the sound of the text indicates a positive perspective.
